## Block.setDateConstraint() method

Specify a constraint on possible valid dates

**Signature:**

```typescript
setDateConstraint(constraint: DateConstraint, field: string | string[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  constraint | [DateConstraint](./forms42core.dateconstraint.md) | The date constraint to apply. |
|  field | string \| string\[\] | The name of the field or an array of field names to apply the constraint to. |

**Returns:**

void
